I build growth engines for brands — SEO, Ads & Social

I'm a creative, detail-oriented Digital Marketing Executive skilled in SEO, Social Media management, WordPress (Elementor), Canva design, email marketing, blog posting and Meta Ads. I handle end-to-end SEO projects — from keyword research to backlinking and content optimization — and craft performance-driven social and paid campaigns.

View my work Contact me
Skills: SEO • Content Strategy • Meta Ads • WordPress • Email Marketing • Analytics

About me

Hi — I'm Tejas Patel, a Digital Marketing Executive at iBird Solutions. With 1+ year of professional experience I focus on delivering measurable growth through SEO, content and paid channels. I enjoy turning data into action and crafting creative campaigns that convert.

Experience

  • Digital Marketing Executive — iBird Solutions (2024 - Present)
    Handled end-to-end SEO projects, WordPress builds, Meta ad campaigns and social content.
  • React JS Intern — eCodeSoft Solutions (Internship)
    Worked on front-end features and responsive layouts.

Quick facts

  • Location: India (Open to remote)
  • Certifications: HubSpot Digital Marketing
  • Languages: English, Gujarati, Hindi
